short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize your research while learning easily with Zealoq extension, which lets you create Learning cards with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zealoq Chrome Extension's purpose is to add ease and flexibility for its users in learning. 
It helps you save, organize and with one-click ease to add your research articles into your organized repository.
The extension can help you 
a. immediately add your research article into your learning cards
b. organize the articles in proper sections
c. structure your learning decks with added articles
